pages.text: $(li)The Duck Egg can be thrown away right clicking while you are holding it in your hand.$(br)$(li)When the egg hits a block, this one has a little possibility of make a baby $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/duck)Duck$(/l) appears.

$(l) Duck Eggs Craft Recipes$()$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/duck_egg_crate)Duck Egg Crate$(/l)$(li)Pie$(li)Cake$(li)Tart$(li)Pancake$(li)Pudding$(li)Scrambled Egg$(li)Fried egg$(li)Aether-Glazed Cupcake
